amendment.description: Amendment provides that nothing in the bill precludes NOAA from carrying out studies of long-term climate and global change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 10 in the congressional Record of October 10, 1995 to specify that nothing in the bill should preclude or inhibit NOAA from carrying out studies of long term global climate changes.

action.text: Lofgren amendment (A025) modified by unanimous consent. The term "inhibit" was deleted from the amendment.
On agreeing to the Lofgren amendment (A025) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
